widget.name: Telerik.UI.RadNumericBox
widget.title: RadNumericBox
widget.description: A textbox control for numeric input.

property.name: sensitivity
property.description: Gets or sets how long you have to drag (in px) before spin happens. Default is 1.

property.name: enabled
property.description: Gets or sets the enabled state of the control.

property.name: value
property.description: Gets or sets the current numeric value.

property.name: decimals
property.description: Gets or sets the number precision. If not set precision defined by current culture is returned.

property.name: format
property.description: Gets or sets the format of the number. Any valid number format is allowed.

property.name: min
property.description: Gets or sets the smallest value the user can enter.

property.name: max
property.description: Gets or sets the largest value the user can enter.

property.name: step
property.description: Gets or sets the increment/decrement step.

property.name: placeholder
property.description: Gets or sets the text displayed when the input is empty.

property.name: incrementTooltip
property.description: Gets or sets the text of tooltip on the increment button.

property.name: decrementTooltip
property.description: Gets or sets the text of tooltip on the decrement button.

property.name: culture
property.description: Gets or sets current culture of the control. The format is BCP-47 language tag with language and region for example: en-US, fr-FR

property.name: element
property.description: Gets the DOM element that hosts this control.

property.name: initialized
property.description: Indicates whether the control is initialized.
